QuestData.Title: No Orc Left Behind
QuestData.Description: This was supposed to be a routine sweep, $n. Clean up a few troggs, make sure there is no threat to the city and then be in the tavern by midday.$b$bInstead I've a group of scouts missing, flame hounds pouring out of the chasm and Xorenth going on about "the next twilight's hammer."$b$b<Commander Bagran spits>$b$bGo in there and get my scouts back so we can figure out what is going on down here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 5 Kor'kron Scouts in Ragefire Chasm.
QuestData.RewardText: That's all that survived?$b$bI don't know who these Dark Shaman are working for, but they are going to pay for this.
